page.title: 04The school morning
page.content: School starts at 9.15a.m. with an {assembly}followed by{registration}in our classrooms before the school divides into sets for{maths}until{play {time}at 10.40. Then there is a rush to buy crisps. An{English}lesson follows at 10.55 and lasts until 11.55 when silence descends as everyone{reads quietly until{lunchtime}(12.15). We have two dinner sittings and a choice of three meals, a full cooked meal or two snack lunches, all cooked on the premises. A lot of children bring their own sandwiches. During the lunch hour there are {recorder}and{guitar}lessons;{computer, {chess}and{science}clubs;{gymnastics and{games}practice.On rainy days we play indoor games or draw in our classrooms or just finish off our work.It is quite noisy and crowded then. The bell rings at 1.30.
